verb.definition: Persist in an activity or process.
verb.example: He continued to work despite the noise.
The meeting continued after a short break.

noun.definition: The action of carrying something on over a period of time or the process of being carried on.
noun.example: The continuation of the discussion was necessary.

noun.definition: A part that is attached to and is an extension of something else.
noun.example: The book is a continuation of the series.

usage_examples: We will continue the discussion tomorrow.
The rain continued for three days.
